meanings.definition: The action or practice of performing a past event or role again.
meanings.sent1: The school play was a reenactment of a famous historical battle.
meanings.sent2: The reenactment of the wedding was beautifully done.
meanings.sent3: The reenactment of the food fight in the movie made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her reenactment of the dance routine was flawless.
meanings.sent5: The reenactment of the magic show left the audience in awe.

meanings.definition: A performance or representation of a past event or role.
meanings.sent1: The reenactment of the play brought history to life for the audience.
meanings.sent2: The reenactment of the crime scene was crucial for the investigation.
meanings.sent3: The reenactment of the race had everyone cheering for their favorite team.
meanings.sent4: His reenactment of the speech was so convincing.
meanings.sent5: The reenactment of the battle was so realistic, it felt like being there.
